page.text: SABINA FLOREAL
309 Old Bergen Road
Jersey City, NJ 07305
sabina_floreal@yahoo.com
OBJECTIVE
Employment in Criminal Justice where I can use my education
and experiences.
EDUCATION
New Jersey City University: Jersey City, NJ
BACHELOR OF SCIENCE: Criminal Justice
GRADE POINT AVERAGE 3.06 out of 4.0
Hudson County Community College: Jersey City, NJ
Completed 24 credits
RELATED EXPERIENCES
2014-Present Hudson County Superior Courthouse: Jersey City, NJ
INTERN/VOLUNTEER: Monitor/supervised visits for Family
court; writing progress report for supervised visits of Non-
custodial parent and child and observed court cases at Criminal
division court
Hudson County Community College: Jersey City, NJ
WORK STUDY: Prepared student mailings for the financial aid
office. Maintained and updated student financial aid
information. Translated for students, as required.
Pershing LLC: Jersey City, NJ
ACCOUNTS TRANSFER INTERN: Processed client accounts
for the Automated Customer Account Transfer (ACATS)
Department. Reviewed security procedures for individual
accounts and “rejected” ones that failed the security audit.
Maintained compliance with Securities and Exchange
Commission (SEC) rules and regulations.
HMS Host: Ridgefield Park, NJ
CASHIER-CUSTOMER SERVICE: Operated cash register and
processed cash and credit-debit card payments. Conducted
nightly cash drawer audits. Supervised one employee per shift.
Prepared foods in compliance with local and state health code
regulations.
SPECIAL SKILLS
Intermediate conversational skills in Haitian Creole.
Microsoft Word, Excel, PowerPoint, and Internet Explorer
SVP forms- Supervised Visitation Progress Reports
ACHIEVEMENTS 2014 DEAN LIST
The National Society of Leadership and Success – Member Date 2015
- Present
Selected by campus administration to join this leadership honor
society and participate with top students in a comprehensive
leadership program including:
Leadership Training Day: Trained in leadership and success skills via an introspective
and interactive training session.
Speaker Events: Participated in seminars led by celebrities and best-selling authors on
topics such as leadership, time management, and goal setting.
Success Networking Teams: Participated in peer based leadership development teams
Experienced in setting and achieving goals, receiving coaching, coaching others, and holding
others accountable to commitments
Recipient of the National Excellence in Leadership Award
REFERENCES
AVAILABLE ON REQUEST
